Now, putting all the steps into a Fortran program.

The program outline:

program main

   implicit none

   character(len=100000) :: S  ! Assuming input string is up to 1e5 characters.

   integer :: N, i, tmp, radix, ans

   integer, dimension(0:2018) :: mod_cnt

   integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: mod_arr

   character(len=20) :: ans_str

   ! Read input

   read(*, '(A)') S

   N = len_trim(S)

   allocate( mod_arr(1:N) )

   ! Initialize variables

   mod_cnt = 0

   radix =1

   ! Process the string

   do i =1, N

      integer :: digit

      character(1) :: current_char

      current_char = S(N -i +1: N -i +1)

      digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')

      tmp = mod( digit * radix, 2019 )

      if (i >1) then

         tmp = mod( tmp + mod_arr(i-1), 2019 )

      end if

      mod_arr(i) = tmp

      mod_cnt(tmp) = mod_cnt(tmp) +1

      radix = mod( radix *10, 2019 )

   end do

   ! Compute the answer

   mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) +1

   ans =0

   do i=0,2018

      ans = ans + mod_cnt(i)*(mod_cnt(i)-1)/2

   end do

   ! Process the answer through the second program's logic

   write(ans_str, '(I0)') ans

   ! Replace commas with spaces

   integer :: j, len_ans

   len_ans = len_trim(ans_str)

   do j=1, len_ans

      if (ans_str(j:j) == ',') then

         ans_str(j:j) = ' '

      end if

   end do

   ! Output the result

   print *, trim(ans_str)

   deallocate(mod_arr)

end program main
